name: Alien Tech Firefox Add-ons (unified version)
description:
Hi, 2009. Aliens strike back.

*** This new version will work for both Firefox 2 and Firefox 3. ***

For extra effects, see style 9289 .
A new embedded version is available. It is *really* huge (approx. 1MB) so I can't publish it here. Get it at http://quantumsearcher.net/designs/addons_tech/alien_tech_firefox_addons.css
You can download a copy of this style on my own server in case it doesn't work here. See http://quantumsearcher.net/designs/addons_tech/alien_tech_firefox_addons_direct.css

This style intends to replace the default style for the firefox add-ons site: clear, light and simple. Here is a dark alternative for those who don't like it, need a change, or simply save their eyes while browsing late at night ^^
additional_info:
Why "Alien tech" ? Because it is made with a trichromatic color-scheme, mainly blue and red, linked together by some green elements; and especially because of the various glow effects. It reminds me some sort of a strange console...
Every icon, arrow and many others have been completely changed to match the new colors, even the firefox logo !
I tried to make this style as clear and readable as possible.

You can see a bigger screenshot of what it does here:
http://quantumsearcher.net/designs/addons_tech/amo.png (approx. 430KB)

This style is NOT for now intended to work with addons for Thunderbird, Seamonkey and Sunbird on then mozilla.org site.
I am not able to reskin the addon management part -for now- because I don't have any.

Full version history available at http://quantumsearcher.net/designs/addons_tech/changelog

More than 2000 downloads ! Thank you all for downloading... and also for your patience, I know a whole year between updates is very long.
And please, if you post a review (good or bad), please explain a bit your choice ^^

Support:

Post a review here, on the forum, or write to me at green[dot]glopp[at]gmail[dot]com .
